title: About
text: Yale University Library‚Äôs StatLab supports all data, computational, and statistical inquiries. Whether you are an undergraduate researcher learning statistics for the first time, or a seasoned researcher looking for new tools to analyze complex data, we aim to provide quality support through 1-1 consultations, specialized workshops and instruction, and expertly crafted research guides.
